name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cover Me AI: Cover Letter Generator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly generate cover letters based on your LinkedIn profile or CV right on the job application website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension generates cover letters based on your LinkedIn profile or CV right on the job application website.
By installing this extension, users can save time and effort in creating professional cover letters tailored to specific job applications.
